org.daisy.pipeline.tts

Class AudioFootprintMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.tts.AudioFootprintMonitor

  • public class AudioFootprintMonitor
extends Object
    AudioFootprintMonitor monitors the footprint of the audio data created by the TTS processors. The audio data goes through two virtual memory spaces: a space for the TTS and a space for the encoding. The former is bigger and throws exceptions if there is no space left, rather than possibly deadlocking on blocking requests. The latter can afford to block on the requests, since if the space is full, it will be consumed by the encoding threads.
